text: Oh, Nancy, you're sitting here. I am looking for you everywhere.
Please don't talk to me. Just go from here.
Oh no. What happened to you?
No, I am not angry with you.
Then what is the problem? Why are you sitting alone?
This is my problem. I will solve it myself.
Okay, then I am going from here.
Please come and sit beside me.
Now tell me why you are worrying.
No, first tell me why you came here.
I came to see you. You were not at home.
Now tell me, why are you alone here?
No, this is not the real reason.
You know, tomorrow is my job interview.
I don't know what questions they will ask me.
Don't worry. I will help you.
Yes, just like a real interview.
You can practice and feel confident.
I did not sleep well last night.
That is why you are nervous.
I am lucky to have you.
Okay, I will not  smile again.
Let's prepare. Well,  yes, let's do it.
I know you will do great.
Yes. Fresh mind,  fresh energy,  fresh confidence.
Okay, Nancy, welcome to your interview.
My name is Nancy. I live here.
I finished my graduation last year.
Why do you want this job?
I want to learn and grow in my career.
What do you know about our company?
Your company is very popular and trusted.
Yes, I like working with a team.
Sometimes I overthink, but I am improving.
I stay calm and focus on my work.
I am dedicated and ready to learn.
I think calmly and find solutions.
Are you flexible with work hours?
Do you have any questions for us?
Yes. What are the growth opportunities?
We provide training and promotion chances.
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?
I see myself growing with a company.
Are you confident in your skills?
Yes, I am confident and learning more.
I am improving it every day.
Yes, I am trying my best.
I like reading and listening to music.
Do you work well with seniors?
I try again with more effort.
Do you enjoy learning new things?
Thank you. I feel confident now.
I am scared of speaking English.
When I speak, I make mistakes.
Because of this, I stay quiet.
No, it is not very weak.
I forget words when I speak.
I know but I feel scared.
Slow is okay. Clear is important.
English is easy step by step.
You always say good things because I believe in you.
Maybe one step at a time.
English will not scare me now.
Listening also helps  like English videos.
Use simple words,  not big words.
Practice in front of a mirror.
I am not afraid of English.
Let's do a small role play.
Thanks to your effort,  I believe in myself.
Only confidence  and practice. I am ready for the future.
